entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Ice fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
